embed.title: Eid Mubarak!
embed.description: Eid Mukarak to all tMuslim users! We hope you have a blessed Eid! Here's the scoop of the new tMuslim updates:

fields.name: Goodbye Ramadan Special commands :wave:
fields.value: We have removed the Ramadan special commands. We hope you enjoyed them! We will be adding more special commands in the future!

fields.name: Support for new languages :earth_africa:
fields.value: Coming soon! We are working on adding support for new languages! Stay tuned!

fields.name: New commands :new:
fields.value: We have added new commands! With the next update, tou can  use `/quran` to get a random verse from the Quran! You will also be able to use use `/hadith` to get a random hadith from the Sahih Bukhari!

fields.name: Bug fixes :bug:
fields.value: We have fixed some bugs and improved the stability of the bot! We will be adding more features in the future!
